meanings.sent1: The fictioneers gathered at the library for a writing workshop.
meanings.sent2: Many fictioneers enjoy attending book signings to meet their favorite authors.
meanings.sent3: The fictioneers joked about creating a story where cats ruled the world.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she joined the ranks of the fictioneers.
meanings.sent5: The young fictioneer dreamed of becoming a bestselling author one day.

meanings.definition: A group of people who create fiction.
meanings.sent1: The fictioneers collaborated on a novel that became a bestseller.
meanings.sent2: In the writing club, the fictioneers shared tips and feedback on each other's work.
meanings.sent3: The fictioneers decided to invent a fantastical world where dragons were pets.
meanings.sent4: Among the fictioneers, she found a sense of belonging and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The group of fictioneers met every week to discuss their latest story ideas.

meanings.definition: To engage in the creation of fiction.
meanings.sent1: She fictioneers every evening after work, crafting tales of adventure.
meanings.sent2: They fictioneered together during the weekend, weaving stories of mystery and intrigue.
meanings.sent3: He fictioneers with such passion that his stories come to life in the minds of readers.
meanings.sent4: The author fictioneers with words, painting vivid scenes in the reader's imagination.
meanings.sent5: Fictioneering allows her to escape into worlds of her own making.
